info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 16 at 12:56PM CDT until July 16 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
info.description:
TORMKX
The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Southeastern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin...
* Until 145 PM CDT.
* At 1255 PM CDT, a confirmed large and extremely dangerous tornado was located near Mazomanie, or 12 miles southwest of Sauk City, moving northeast at 30 mph.
This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW!
HAZARD...Damaging tornado.
SOURCE...Law enforcement confirmed tornado. At 1255 PM, law enforcement reported a tornado north of Barneveld.
IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible.
* Locations impacted include... Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Mazomanie, Black Earth, Arena, and Marxville.
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 1:45 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 1:45 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

area.areaDesc: Dane, WI; Iowa, WI; Sauk, WI

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 1:45 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 1:45 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.

area.areaDesc: Dane, WI; Iowa, WI; Sauk, WI
